item.title: Workers value recognition more than money
item.description:
Source: ACCA report. Tone at the top influences corporate behaviour the most, according to 61% of respondents. A recent report by the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) titled “Culture and channelling corporate behaviour: ACCA member survey” found that workplace recognition is the most significant motivator for employees across all ages, industries, and locations. Notably, this recognition even outweighs monetary rewards. The survey, conducted with support from the Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC), gathered insights from nearly 2,000 ACCA finance professionals globally...
